item.title: Walking up Apex
item.description: updated on 20Jan22 Random thoughts on Apex development Avoid deeply nexted if statements –> find a pattern that should be used in a cascade of checks? Small functions with easily testable inputs and outputs –> what are functions here? Are these methods? Fast Tests –> meaning short tests that execute quickly Good balance between abstraction and implementation –> have no clue what this means?
